§ 7908. Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated such sums as are necessary to carry out this chapter. (Pub. L. 101–240, title VII, § 738, as added Pub. L. 109–58, title XVI, § 1611, Aug. 8, 2005, 119 Stat. 1117.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective Oct. 1, 2005, except as otherwise provided, see section 739 of Pub. L. 101–240, set out as a note under section 7901 of this title.
